## ouroctl get devicegroup

Get a template for a device group

### Synopsis

Retrieves a template for a device group that can be used to create new device groups.

```
ouroctl get devicegroup [flags]
```

### Examples

```
ouroctl get devicegroup
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for devicegroup
```
